Reactions

MethodURLDescription
GET/api/reactionsavailable emoji reactions

GET /api/reactions#

Returns:

{ "available": [
{"id":1,"content":"👍"},
{"id":2,"content":"😂"},
{"id":3,"content":"😁"},
{"id":4,"content":"😎"},
{"id":5,"content":"🤔"},
{"id":6,"content":"😍"},
{"id":7,"content":"😴"},
{"id":8,"content":"😬"},
{"id":9,"content":"🙃"},
...
]
}
